== Maniyoor (CT) (627217) ==

Maniyoor (CT) is a town in the [[Taliparamba]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 14.02 sq. km. and harbouring 2594 households with total population of 12681 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 16 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 530 km. Male population is 5902 and female population is 6779. Scheduled Caste population is 401 and Scheduled Tribes population is 26. Census Location Code of the town is 627217<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 110 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 120 km. Railway station is at Kannur at a distance of 16 km.
